name: Spoink (Declan Smyth)
description:
Have you heard the story of ages long since past? It is told by every generation, they dare not forget, they dare not repeat.
This great balad contains only the bloodiest of battles, the most ruthless of betrayals, the sadest of endings...

This is the story of the Chickens and the Hippos...

Which side are YOU on?
Chicken, or Hippo...
